On [[10 July]] [[1964]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Alan White''' (aged 13).

*'''Description''': One page, typewritten and signed by Tolkien in both Roman letters and [[tengwar]].<ref>[http://www.forodrim.org/daeron/mdtci.html The Mellonath Daeron Index of Tengwa Specimina (DTS)] of the webpage of [[Forodrim]]</ref>
